page.title: 05HOUSING
page.content: The majority of the area's population live in council accomodation on several estates.Owned by Rotherham Metropolitan Borough .The bulk of these properties are semi_detached and over 20 years old.Most houses are brick built but the 19th century houses are built of local sandstone.The private housing tends to be modern.Last 20 years ,and in small clusters.There is an ample facility for O.A.P. accomodation in bungalows.A group of prefabs still exist and are occupied though their life span is almost over.
